summary: AN ORDINANCE, relating to the Department of Parks and Recreation; authorizing the Superintendent to execute an agreement with King County for a Puget Sound Urban Resources Partnership grant to support the Roxhill Park Wetlands Creek Restoration Project; increasing the expenditure allowance of the Department's 2000 CIP budget by making a reimburseable appropriation from the Cumulative Reserve Subfund; all by a three-fourths vote of the City Council.
